underlying_goal: To standardize and improve a large library of system prompts, and then update project documentation (catalogue, slides) to reflect the changes.
primary_success: Successfully executing a multi-stage refactoring task involving prompt design, file management, and documentation updates, while iteratively incorporating user feedback and consulting specialist agents.
brief_summary: The user initiated a major cleanup and standardization of a sandbagging prompt library. Claude and the user collaboratively diversified 'covertness' instructions across ~90 prompts, simplified and categorized a new generic prompt, and fixed inaccuracies in the master prompt CATALOGUE.yaml. Finally, Claude updated a presentation slide deck to reflect the corrected prompt counts.
